content.title: 🚀 Fully Funded in 4 Minutes—Thanks to You!
content.creator:
Circular
March 7, 2025
content.content:
Dear backers,

🚀 We can hardly believe it. Circular Ring 2 was fully funded in just 4 minutes. In just 40 minutes, we hit $100,000, and now we’re closing in on $400,000 in funding!
These results remind us why we never gave up.
❤️ To every single one of you who believed in us, who backed us, who made this moment possible—thank you. This isn’t just a milestone. It’s a testament to the trust you’ve placed in us, and that trust means the world.
✊ We poured five years into making Circular Ring 2 everything it was meant to be. And now, we’re more determined than ever to deliver the best, the smartest, the most reliable experience for you–becoming a part of your well-being.

👇 Our founders wanted to personally thank you for your incredible support in making this launch such a success. Watch their message and celebrate this milestone with us!
🙌 This is just the beginning. We can’t wait to show you what’s next.
With all our gratitude,
The Circular Team
Other Projects We Like
Starship Pro: Pocket-Sized Power Bank with 210W Output
The Future Starship Pro is a compact yet ultra-powerful 10,000mAh power bank designed for fast, efficient, and uninterrupted charging, making it perfect for travel, work, and daily use.
210W Total Output: Facilitates fast and efficient charging for multiple devices
Dual 140W USB-C Ports: Capable of charging power-hungry devices like MacBooks, gaming laptops, and tablets at full speed
30-Minute Full Recharge: With a 90W (or higher) charger, the Future Starship Pro powers up in just 30 minutes
Compact Design: Portable and travel-friendly, making it convenient for on-the-go use
Airplane-Safe: Complies with airline safety standards for carry-on batteries
Get Now!

Meet Planck - The Most Powerful SSD for Its Size! It clicks straight onto your Phone, disappears in your palm as you record, and packs more power than you’d ever expect from a device so incredibly small!
Up to 2TB of storage

Water & Dust Resistant
It’s time to change the  mobile content creation game.
Get yours now with up to 36% OFF.

It’s the best 75% keyboard for gamers—centered around speed, precision, and durability.

Meet Looktech AI Glasses—your intelligent companion that’s always there for you. It remembers your preferences, routines, and grows with you. 
Get real-time AI assistance, capture memories, answer calls, and enjoy music—all hands-free.
